{"id":1097588447,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1699843224,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"38 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1097588447/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Sort Vowels in a String","memory":"12.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string sortVowels(string s) {\n        string vow;\n        for(auto c:s)\n        {\n            if(c == 'a' || c=='e' || c=='i' || c=='o' || c=='u' || c=='A' || c=='E' || c=='I'               || c=='O' || c=='U')\n            {\n                vow.push_back(c);\n            }\n        }\n        sort(vow.begin(),vow.end());\n        int trace=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++)\n        {\n            char c = s[i];\n           if(c == 'a' || c=='e' || c=='i' || c=='o' || c=='u' || c=='A' || c=='E' || c=='I'               || c=='O' || c=='U')\n            {\n                s[i]=vow[trace];\n               trace++;\n            } \n        }\n        return s;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"sort-vowels-in-a-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
